timeline.message:
NXP-29587: Scroller produces records downstream depending on a threshold

If the bulk scroller materialize more than 1m ids, records are sent
downstream to prevent a possible OOM.

timeline.author: ataillefer

replies.bodyText: yes bad formatter config fixed in next push
replies.author: bdelbosc

timeline.message:
NXP-29585: Add Bulk command queryLimit

A default limit can be set on action and overriden when building command,
a flag in the status indicate if the limit has been reached for a command.
